mods.abstract: The title "Flotsam", describes the mood set by the abstracted pictorial composition of the wrecked debris.
mods.note: This cliché verre was printed with one dye, but because of the thickness of the matrix emulsion, the wide range of colors resultedThe amount of time exposure to the li9ght source also influenced the color results in the printThe print ranges from shades of deep lavender to shades of greenThe bubble-texture of the background was the result of minimal exposure to the light sourceThe artist definitely desired this textured background to support the activity of the central areasMsDurieux related that when working in this printing technique, one must, "...do all that MrEastman tells not to do..."

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.)Museum of Art

CONTENTdmData.dmGetItemInfo: {"title":"Flotsam","creato":"Durieux, Caroline, 1896-1989","date":"1963","subjec":"Abstract paintings","descri":"The title \"Flotsam\", describes the mood set by the abstracted pictorial composition of the wrecked debris.","notes":"This clich\u00e9 verre was printed with one dye, but because of the thickness of the matrix emulsion, the wide range of colors resultedThe amount of time exposure to the li9ght source also influenced the color results in the printThe print ranges from shades of deep lavender to shades of greenThe bubble-texture of the background was the result of minimal exposure to the light sourceThe artist definitely desired this textured background to support the activity of the central areasMsDurieux related that when working in this printing technique, one must, \"...do all that MrEastman tells not to do...\"","editio":"4 of 12","type":"Image","medium":"Color clich\u00e9 verre","sizewe":"12-3\/4 x 16-1\/4 in.","format":"jpeg 2000","source":"Louisiana State University Museum of Art (http:\/\/appl003.lsu.edu\/museum\/moa.nsf\/index\/)","reposi":"Finding aid for the original photographs: http:\/\/www.lib.lsu.edu\/sites\/default\/files\/sc\/findaid\/d3827.html","rights":"Physical rights are retained by the Louisiana State University Museum of Art Copyright is retained in accordance with U S copyright laws.","cite":"Caroline Wogan Durieux Collection at the LSU Museum of Art, LOUISiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.","contac":"E-mail fhuber@lsu.edu with questions or comments","frame":"22-3\/4X24-7\/8","access":"2001.3.64","langua":{},"object":"cd000104","item":"See 'reference url' on the navigation bars.","collec":"Homepage: http:\/\/www.louisianadigitallibrary.org\/cdm4\/index_CWD.php?CISOROOT=\/CWD;
